artist: Artist: Lorenz Peter , et al.; Editor: Fiona Smyth
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of a girl on a stool with a beheaded pet with five arms, printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 24 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: The Wilding, no. 1: the "Beloved Beheaded" issue
